trans-unit.source: Defines identifiers that indicate the type of a refresh of the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 定義識別項，表示 [屬性] 視窗的重新整理型別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties> defines identifiers for types of refresh methods that can be used when refreshing the view of the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties> 定義類型的重新整理 [屬性] 視窗檢視時，可以使用的重新整理方法的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the ttribute class to specify the refresh mode for a `DataSource` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ttribute 類別來指定的重新整理模式`DataSource`屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form 控制項中套用的屬性](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The properties should be requeried and the view should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 必須查詢屬性，並重新整理檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the ttribute class to specify the refresh mode for a `DataSource` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ttribute 類別來指定的重新整理模式`DataSource`屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form 控制項中套用的屬性](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。
